5.title: Presales support specialist
5.job_description:
[
Responsibilities:
Design of industrial air-conditioning and heating systems with heat pump 
Calculation of heat consumption and heat input for buildings. 
Design solutions for partners and customers. 
First run of installed systems 
Technical support and relationships with designers of partners and customers 
Reporting on work 
Requirements: 
Technical education 
Analitical abilities,positive and open minded, good communication skills, strong responsibility and proactive attitude 
Advanced user of MS Excel and AutoCAD 
Intermediate English, Ukrainian and Russian 

]

6.title: Customer support representative (German)
6.job_description:
[
Govitall is the world`s largest international IT product company in the realm of educational projects and driving successful careers. Govitall is the leading company in its sector. Сustomers from 109 countries give preference to our company’s products so we will not list them all :)Now we’re looking for a dedicated, responsible and motivated Customer Support Representative (German) to join our team.Why work with us?The most important thing is for us to work as a team, so we attach great importance to creating a winning corporate culture. We encourage initiative and fresh thinking: creative people, strong ambitious professionals and versatile personalities comprise our team.We offer all these perks typical for IT-companies, though people want to get hired here not only because of goodies, but because of shared values. Nowadays, we are developing several social initiatives.Requirements:
Fluent German language (verbal and written)
Ability to learn fast
Initiative and desire to work
Main responsibilities:
Provide customer support via chat and phone
Consult new clients about products, discounts, payment options etc.
Provide support for existing clients
Follow communication procedures, guidelines and policies
Ensure that each customer receives outstanding service by providing a friendly environment
Conditions of work:
8-hours working day (office) 
2 days off per week
We offer:
The most technology-advanced office among IT companies with solar panels installed on our roof, as we strongly support the idea of «green office»
A convenient open-plan workplace with lots of comfortable working areas
Unlimited professional development and growth opportunities (the company covers the сost of conferences, seminars, courses and other events (including foreign ones)
Free on-site bicycle and car parking with electric cars charging points
Free English lessons, corporate library and yoga classes
Сorporate events and means of entertainment (Playstation, table tennis and football)
A large number of team development and team building trainings as well as huge and lively corporate parties, our own football team, table tennis tournaments
Sport compensation: gym membership/ sport activities reimbursement. We do really care about healthy lifestyle
You can check out our workspace here: https://jobs.dou.ua/companies/govitall/photos/
]

11.title: Специалист техподдержки пользователей 1С
11.job_description:
[
Холдинговая компания «Комплекс Агромарс» (ТМ «Гавриловские курчата») приглашает на работу Специалиста технической поддержки пользователей 1СТребования:
Опыт работы на линии поддержки пользователей 1С8 
Способность к анализу, определению сути обращений пользователей, идентификации причин ошибок в работе программного обеспечения
Минимальные навыки в программировании 1С8
Способность читать программный код
Исполнительность, стрессоустойчивость, умение общаться с людьми 
Обязанности:
Прием и фиксация обращений пользователей 1С
Консультирование пользователей по работе с корпоративными информационными системами (на базе 1С8 УПП)
Написание инструкций для пользователей
Поиск и подготовка предложений, направленных на уменьшение типичных обращений пользователей
Обучение пользователей
Структурирование информации, разработка и описание процессов внесения справочной информации в 1С
Условия:
Официальное оформление и социальные гарантии согласно КЗоТ Украины
Территориальное расположение офиса: ул. Пожарского 3 (от станции метро «Дарница» пешая доступность офиса в течение 10 минут)
Уровень оплаты индивидуально обсудим с успешным кандидатом

]

12.title: Customer support representative (German language)

13.title: Customer Support Representative (English)
13.job_description:
[
We are looking for another Customer Service Specialist to join our proactive team operating largest medical transportation fleet in New York.Together we ensure our clients and drivers provide and receive high-quality transportation. If you are ready for learning and growing within an international company, we are more than willing to support you.Requirements:
Fluent in writing and speaking English.
Ability to work both independently and within a team environment
Analytical & Research Skills
Customer-oriented and responsible attitude
Stress resistance
Will be a plus:
Experience with native speakers

Experience in logistics or transportation
Position Duties:
Assist customers and troubleshoot their problems

Process customer requests made by phone or chats through company dashboard
We offer:
Friendly and professional team
Decent salary after the trial period paid in USD

Career growth opportunity
14 days of paid vacation
Conveniently located office in the heart of Kiev

]
